main.name: Dao Ngoc Hieu
main.bio: I am a Computer Science student at the National University of Singapore. I am also a software developer with experience in building websites and mobile applications.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computing in Computer Science
education.description: CAP: 4.58/5.0. Expect Honours with Highest Distinction

education.school: High School for Gifted Students - Hanoi National University, University of Education
education.description: Achieved a total score of 27.8/30 on the National University Entrance Exam

achievments.name: Award of Nancy Tan Siew Lan Bursary
achievments.title: Singapore

achievments.name: Second Prize in Science Olympiad at State Level
achievments.title: Vietnam

work.title: Computer Vision Engineer Intern
work.description: • Developed a program that provides the direction and velocity of the underwater vehicle based on input images coming from the vehicle’s downward camera. The program was written in C++ and OpenCV.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description:
• Developed point of sale applications including a dashboard website and a React Native mobile app
• Worked on both back-end (PostgreSQL) and front-end (React, React Native) for the company’s applications
• Lead developer of the back-end and APIs for the company’s loyalty system

work.title: Student Tutor
work.description:
• Student tutor for CS1010 Programming Methodology under Professor Ooi Wei Tsang, NUS School of Computing
• Organized tutorials and labs for 9 students, graded their assignments and provided additional consultation
• Clarified questions concerning programming methodology in C, basic UNIX-related concepts and practices

projects.name: 3D Geometry Mobile Application (cross-platform)
projects.title: Personal Project
projects.description:
• A 3D Geometry visualization application that aims to help students in 3d geometry problems
• The app was build using React Native and three.js. All 3D objects were created using BufferGeometry, which is more difficult to use but gives better performance

projects.name: NUSocial Android Application
projects.title: Orbital 2020, School of Computing, NUS
projects.description:
• A social media application exclusively built for NUS students. Highlight features are buddy matching and location-based broadcasting. The app also provides social media functionality such as messaging, posting and forming communities. An admin web is provided for community admins
• This project reached Artemis Tier (Extreme) of the Orbital 2020 Programme

projects.name: I'm the Best Coder, Shopee
projects.title: Team Freshie Frenzy
projects.description:
• Ranked 24/210. The first 50 teams are visible on the leaderboard
• Implemented a program written in Python to detect frauds in selling posts. These frauds include fake reviews and descriptions.

testimonials.text: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough
